context_bundle.summary: Critical file paths and locations across the PhiVector ecosystem. Reference before assuming paths.

onboarding.quick_start: VHDX: F:\\CARBYNE.vhdx (production) mounts as X:. AHK: C:\\Program Files\\AHK\\v2\\AutoHotkey64.exe. Scripts: X:\\AHK  SCRIPTS\\. PhiExecutor: X:\\Automation\\. KALIC brain: C:\\PhiDEX\\kalic_brain\\. PhiSHRI: C:\\Users\\Stryker_LOCAL\\.phishri\\. Tool schemas: C:\\PhiDEX\\tool_schemas\\.
common_patterns: Everything MCP for fast file search
known_errors: AHK scripts path has TWO SPACES: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\
